title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Organic Farming: Concepts and principles of organic farming; Key indicators of sustainable agriculture; Transition to organic agriculture.Production Management: Rotation design for organic system; Input management; Plant protection measures; Organic crop management: field crops, horticulture and plantation crops.Livestocks Management: Input management; Feed and fodder; Animal health.Organic Standards and Marketing: Standards of organic agriculture; Organic certification, Processing and marketing.
